triage.root_cause: Todo.from_dict() at src/flywheel/todo.py:70 converts id to int but doesn't validate that it's positive
risk_points: Data integrity: Invalid IDs could be loaded from corrupted/malicious JSON files
Unexpected behavior: Negative/zero IDs could cause issues in ID-based operations
triage.proposed_fix: Add validation after int conversion: if todo_id <= 0: raise ValueError
